com.qtplaf.library.task

Interface TaskListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileCopy.ScanListener, JPanelProgress.TaskAdapter, TaskHandler, TaskRunnerList.TaskAdapter, TaskRunnerThreads.TaskAdapter

    public interface TaskListener
    Interface that should implement listeners interested in the interaction with a task.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelled(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the task has effectively been cancelled (after a cancel request).
      boolean cancelRequested(Task task)
      Invoked to know if task cancellation has been requested.
      void counting(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the task is counting the number of steps.
      void paused(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the task has effectively been paused (after a pause request).
      boolean pauseRequested(Task task)
      Invoked to know if the task has been requested to pause.
      void processing(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the task has started processing.
      void resumed(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the task has effectively been resumed (after a resume request).
      boolean resumeRequested(Task task)
      Invoked to know that after pausing, if resume has beeen requested.
      void setLabel(Task task, java.lang.String label, java.lang.String message)
      Invoked to trace a message to the argument label.
      void stepCount(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the non indeterminate task is going to executed the number of steps.
      void stepEnd(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the step has ended.
      void stepStart(Task task, java.lang.String text)
      Invoked to notify that the step is going to start.
      void terminated(Task task)
      Invoked to notify that the task has terminated.

    • Method Detail

      • counting

        void counting(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the task is counting the number of steps.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • processing

        void processing(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the task has started processing.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • cancelled

        void cancelled(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the task has effectively been cancelled (after a cancel request).
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • cancelRequested

        boolean cancelRequested(Task task)
        Invoked to know if task cancellation has been requested.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if task cancellation has been requested.

      • paused

        void paused(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the task has effectively been paused (after a pause request).
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • pauseRequested

        boolean pauseRequested(Task task)
        Invoked to know if the task has been requested to pause. In non indeterminate tasks, it would normally be invoked at every step.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the task has been requested to pause.

      • resumed

        void resumed(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the task has effectively been resumed (after a resume request).
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • resumeRequested

        boolean resumeRequested(Task task)
        Invoked to know that after pausing, if resume has beeen requested.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if resumen has been requested.

      • terminated

        void terminated(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the task has terminated.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • stepCount

        void stepCount(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the non indeterminate task is going to executed the number of steps.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • stepStart

        void stepStart(Task task,
               java.lang.String text)
        Invoked to notify that the step is going to start. Note that steps should start at 1 and end at the total number of steps to properly manage notification modulus and monitor.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.
        text - The text explaining the step.

      • stepEnd

        void stepEnd(Task task)
        Invoked to notify that the step has ended.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.

      • setLabel

        void setLabel(Task task,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String message)
        Invoked to trace a message to the argument label.
        Parameters:
        task - The task.
        label - The label identifier.
        message - The message.
